name: The beautiful lady & the monsters
short_description:
The beautiful lady & the monsters
© Suryakant Bharti
www.suryakantbharti.com

Story - A Lady was very beautiful, rich & famous. She enjoyed all the happiness & pleasure in her life. But she was extremely arrogant and conceited. She never gave happiness to others. And because of that she was sent to hell after death. Now, for removing her sin, she has got a task from angels. And the task is to collect all the hearts for angels from all places. 

Your goal - Your goal is to collect all the hearts from all the levels. The monsters try to kill you so you should avoid them. The flowers will help you by converting monsters into baby temporarily. Some times angels help you by stopping the monsters when they convert from baby to monsters. Some times angels send cherry for you, take them to get scores, Try to score highest.

About the game :
Levels - The game has ten puzzling levels.
Monsters - The game has twenty entirely different monsters.
summary: It is an exiting game based on pac-man concept with great graphics.
